reviews.review_msg: Great teacher, great sense of humour, and great Scottish accent! Class is never boring as he likes to draw on real-life current events as examples of course themes. I actually didn't like cities much that long ago, but now I am in Urban Studies and have a new found direction I never would have seen if not for the enthusiasm of wonderful Eugene!
Clear lectures, doesnt move too quickly, very fair on the midterm and final questions.  Seemed to have easier material in 362 then 261 though...

Very good prof. Articulates ideas very well, and is funny on top of it. His tests aren't bad if you know your stuff. Memorize lecture notes and your guarenteed a good mark. Keep up with readings but really only have to know the main points.
